General.Name: Chosun Welding
General.Description: CHOSUN WELDING POHANG Co., Ltd produces and sells welding materials in Korea. It offers covered arc welding electrodes, stick electrodes, submerged arc materials, and solid wires, as well as Mag wires for use in carbon dioxide gas arc welding applications. The company was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Pohang, South Korea. CHOSUN WELDING POHANG Co., Ltd operates as a subsidiary of CS Holdings Co., Ltd.
